then.line: Okay, Prota, let's see what you brought me!
Eeeek! What-- oh. Oh, they're just fish bones. Prota, you did me quite a fright.
Yep! Pretty cool, right?
It's pretty somethin', I'll tell you that much.
Though I suppose usin' this... we might just be makin' ourselves a cyborg!
A cyborg?!
Yeah, y'know. It's short for "cybernetic organism". Pairin' the organic with the robotic. A cyborg!
How are cyborgs at finding lost dogs?
Well I'm pleased to say they're unrelentingly good. So I think we can move on to the legs now!
I'll get it done!
I think I found just the thing!
Well I'll be darned! That's a nice lookin' fridge you found there.
Smooth, sleek, stainless steel. And probably full of electronics I can repurpose.
So it'll work?
Not only will it find your dog, it'll keep your lemonade cool all summer long! Good find, Prota.
Thanks, Randi! What's next on the list again?
Well that would be legs, Prota.
Oh! Well I mean, we just need to find Minty. We can probably do that without legs, right?
Hmmm...
Well, all I know is I don't have legs...
And I can't find Minty, just the same as you! Probably shouldn't take the risk.
Okay, Randi! I'll see what I can find out there.
What the-- where'd you find that?
Oh, do you like it?
I mean I sure do, but it's ain't exactly what I was expecting...
But it'll still work right? I'm a little worried.
Hey, you came to the Vintage Viper. You know our motto, don't you?
Yep! "Don't worry! Everything works!"
That's right! Now you get out there and fetch this sleek little body a nice pair of legs, huh?
Aye-aye, Cap'n!
